# OpenAI Translator Agent

![domain:utility](https://img.shields.io/badge/utility-3D8BD3?style=flat&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BCjwvc3ZnPgo%3D)
![tech:llm](https://img.shields.io/badge/llm-E85D2E?style=flat&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%2CPHN2ZyB3aWR0aD0iMTAiIGhlaWdodD0iOCIgdmlld0JveD0iMCAwIDEwIDgiIGZpbGw9Im5vbmUiIHhtbG5zPSJodHRwOi8vd3d3LnczLm9yZy8yMDAwL3N2ZyI%%2BCjwvc3ZnPgo%3D)
[![link to source code](https://img.shields.io/badge/Source%20Code-E8ECF1?style=flat&logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BCjwvc3ZnPgo%3D)](https://github.com/fetchai/uAgent-Examples/tree/main/1-uagents/utility/openai-translator-agent)

This agent uses OpenAI's `gpt-4o-mini` LLM to translate a given text from one language into another language. If the input language is not provided, the AI model will be instructed to try to detect it.

## Example input

```python
TranslationRequest(
    text="I need some donuts",
    language_in="english",
    language_out="dutch",
)
```

## Example output

```python
TranslationResponse(
    text="Ik heb wat donuts nodig"
)
```

## Reference and usage example

Click on the following link to get to the hosted Agent with usage instructions: [OpenAI Translator Agent](https://agentverse.ai/agents/details/agent1qfuexnwkscrhfhx7tdchlz486mtzsl53grlnr3zpntxsyu6zhp2ckpemfdz/profile)
